gen:link.msg:message: `OtherWNTInstitutionsManagingSeniorOfficialsEmployment` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationApproach_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU2_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationApproach_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU2_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PositionOrPositions` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationApproach_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU1_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationApproach_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU1_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReasonsForExceedingMaximumAmountOfRemuneration` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration` is greater than 0. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationApproach_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU2_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationApproach_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU2_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReceivableUnduePaymentsExplanation` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `UnduePayments` is greater than 0. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationApproach_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU1_UnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrLessAntiCumulationApproach_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU1_UnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
